      • getInstance

        public static Game getInstance()
        Accessor Method to return the Singleton instance of the game, or call the constructor if it does not exist.
        Returns:
        The instance of the Game.

      • getMode

        public java.lang.Integer getMode()
        Accessor Method to return the Player Mode of the game.
        Returns:
        Integer Player Mode (Corresponds to number of Human Players).

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Mutator method to initialize the game, including the Board's initialization and setting up the Players.

      • turn

        public void turn(Player aPlayer)
        Method to run a single Turn for a Human Player.

        A player can move a single Piece in a turn. If they jump a piece, they can continue to move the same piece, as long as they can continue to jump other pieces.

        Parameters:
        aPlayer - The Human Player who's turn it is.
